mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM customer_menu WHERE menu_id IN
#{menuIds}
mapper.update:
UPDATE customer_menu A
A.name=#{name},
A.menulevcod=#{menulevcod},
A.supmenucode=#{supmenucode},
A.type=#{type},
A.`key`=#{key},
A.sort=#{sort}
WHERE A.menu_id=#{menu_id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.menu_id,A.cust_id,A.name,A.menulevcod,A.supmenucode,A.`key`,A.`type`,A.sort FROM customer_menu A WHERE A.cust_id=#{cust_id} ORDER BY A.menulevcod,A.sort
